mean_cn: v. （使）权力下放，（使工业、人口等）分散
mean_en: to distribute the administrative functions or powers among several local authorities.
word_etyma: de去掉+central中心+ize动词后缀 → decentralize分权、分散
sentence: If the central government decentralizes, each province will have more autonomy.
sentence_trans: 如果中央政府分权，各省将会有更多自治权。
